entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early in the evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light before morning. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
